BaseOddsOfDeath.label: Base Odds Of Death
BaseOddsOfDeath.help: Base chance of out of mission death for a pilot (1/10 of a percent)

BaseOddsOfVictory.label: Base Odds Of Victory
BaseOddsOfVictory.help: Base chance of out of mission victory for a pilot (1/10 of a percent)

NewPilotRankOddsLow.label: New Pilot Rank Odds Low
NewPilotRankOddsLow.help: Odds that a new pilot will be the second lowest or lowest possible rank

NewPilotRankOddsLowest.label: New Pilot Rank Odds Lowest
NewPilotRankOddsLowest.help: Odds that a new pilot will be lowest possible rank
